To check if ribeye steak, fresh oranges, or toilet paper are on sale at Walmart, I can use the Walmart app on the phone. If any of these items are on sale, I will note their prices in the Notes app. The process involves opening the Walmart app, searching for each item, checking for sale prices, and then recording the information in the Notes app.

### Plan ###
1. Open the Walmart app.
2. Search for "ribeye steak" and check if it is on sale. Note the price if applicable.
3. Search for "fresh oranges" and check if they are on sale. Note the price if applicable.
4. Search for "toilet paper" and check if it is on sale. Note the price if applicable.
5. Open the Notes app and record the sale prices of the items found.

### Current Subgoal ###
Open the Walmart app.

- Enter(): Press the Enter key after typing (useful for searching).
- Switch_App(): Show the App switcher for switching between opened apps.
- Back(): Return to the previous state.
- Home(): Return to home page.
- Wait(): Wait for 10 seconds to give more time for a page loading.
